reward_description: A sword set ablaze with a magical flame
reward_comment: A boon to any adventurer, surely the weapon will see good use.

reward_description: An ancient relic of a king's advisor, fabled to enlighten those who wield it.
reward_comment: A calm focus overcomes you as you take hold of the scepter.

reward_description: A shield from an ancient knight known for his steadfast defense.
reward_comment: A good defense is the best offense I suppose.

reward_description: A belt magically enchanted to give the wearer untold strength
reward_comment: Allows you to skip leg day AND holds up your pants, excellent.

reward_description: A book with secrets of the metaphysical. Each page fills you with brilliance.
A suit of thick heavy metal armor, but upon donning it feels weightless
reward_comment: The crusade carries on through me

reward_description: The helmet of a fabled mercenary known to accept any challenge for the right price
reward_comment: Power takes the alignment of those who wield it.

reward_description: A regal cloak of purple and blue, ancient mythos claims those who wear it see the future.
reward_comment: I peer through the grim darkness of the far future.

reward_description: Heavy metal boots of unparalleled comfort, made from ancient metals making them weightless.
reward_comment: Though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I fear no evil.

reward_description: A vial of weak healing salves, restores minor health
A vial of healing salves, restores health
reward_comment: Goes great with a spoonful of sugar.

reward_description: A vial of strong healing salves, restores greater health
A vial of highly potent healing salves, restores major health
A vial of superior healing salves, restores immense health
reward_comment: Sticks and stones may break my bones, but potions forever cure me.

reward_description: A vial of mythical healing salves, restores full health
reward_comment: Like the phoenix, I rise again!
